## Developer checklist

- [ ] My code is clear and concise
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have provided useful comments in my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My code is lint free
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] This pull request is inline with the [CONTRIBUTING](CONTRIBUTING.md) guide.
